issue.title: [CF 78] ClickFunction on a Icon
issue.body:
Yesterday, I think... This cool AddOn notify me of the things I want to know,
but would not it be even better if I could click on the symbol itself to point out something to trigger?

I do not know in which direction you wanted to have your addon that could just as display tool,
or whether, perhaps, now a next step of his development.

Tom


> Posted by CurseForge user TomHB | Imported from CurseForge issue #78 | Raw
